name: Project Elixandra
description:
Overview

Project Elixandra is a Top-Down Action Shooter in which the Player represents the AI for the ship the main protagonist Elixandra is controlling. The player can select between 4 craft with different statistics for their own gameplay style. The two venture into enemy territory to save a distressed Colony Ship from the tyrannic drone lord Arex!

Features
  • Fight swarms of enemy drones which return fire tenfold resulting in frantic gameplay 
  • Controlled by Keyboard and Mouse 
  • Choose between 4 spaceships to suit your playstyle 
  • Powerful boss fights that challenge the player's skill
Game Info Levels:
  1. Tutorial Simulation 
  2.  Drone Outpost
  3. Asteroid Field 
  4. Arex' Domain
Controls:
  • WASD - Movement 
  • LMB - Shoot 
  • RMB - Bomb 
  • Q/E - Cycle Laser Colour 
  • Space - Advance Cutscene 
MAGES Institute of Excellence

Project: Elixandra was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Student James Santiago as part of the Game Systems Programming Module.
